meanings: if things go at this rate
(관용)look unseemly[awkward, indecent, improper, unsightly, unbecoming];be offensive (to the eye) ;look bad;(be) ignoble;disgraceful

phrases.phrase: 물품의 형상, 모양 혹은 색채 또는 이들의 결합
meanings: 지식재산권_특허 shape, pattern or color or any combination thereof in an article

vlive.korean: 왜 하필 이 모양이었을까요? Why does it look like that? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께 하는 스페셜 V LIVE
vlive.english: Why does it look like that?

vlive.english: MIDZY. - Make an M like this.

vlive.korean: 안 그러면 이 모양대로 탑니다. If you don't, you'll get burnt in the same shape as your outfit. 듣기 View video Space Girl : 태민 생파 같이 준비해요 🎉 Taemin birthday party GRWM
vlive.english: If you don't, you'll get burnt in the same shape as your outfit.

vlive.korean: 이렇게 스티커가 아래로 가서 이 모양이 손톱에 딱 맞게 스티커가 붙은 모양으로. Put the sticker under your nail so that it fits perfectly with your nail. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : SBS MTV <요고바라> 동시생중계
vlive.english: Put the sticker under your nail so that it fits perfectly with your nail.

vlive.korean: [초콜릿 몰드에 녹인 초콜릿을 부어주기!] 우리 이 모양대로 나오는 거겠지? [Pour the melted chocolate into the mold] It'll mold into this shape, right? 듣기 View video OSEN : ASTRO 아스트로 'Star Road' EP.03
vlive.english: [Pour the melted chocolate into the mold] It'll mold into this shape, right?
